00037 /**
00038  * \file datasetP.h
00039  * \brief Private declarations for the \ref Dataset module.
00040  *
00041  * $Source: /usr/local/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/modules/datasetP.h,v $
00042  * $Revision: 1.19 $ 
00043  * $Date: 2006/09/22 02:16:52 $
00044  */
00045 
00046 #ifndef _FC_DATASET_P_H_
00047 #define _FC_DATASET_P_H_
00048 
00049 #ifdef __cplusplus
00050 extern "C" {
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 // include these in basic data structures to simplify includes for the
00054 // the rest of the library which won't ever use them
00055 #include "tableP.h"
00056 #include "fileio.h"
00057 #include "fileioP.h"
00058 
00059 /**
00060  * \ingroup  PrivateDataset
00061  * \brief Dataset Slot Structure for the Dataset Table
00062  *
00063  * \description
00064  *
00065  *   This structure contains meta data for a dataset. Besides the information
00066  *   stored in the header (see _FC_SlotHeader), this struct has a structure
00067  *   containing file IO info. It also knows which sequences and meshes it owns.
00068  *
00069  * \todo ?someday make fileInfo dynamically allocated -- would only save
00070  *   a little space at the expensse of added complexity. Unless there
00071  *   is dynamically allocated stuff within fileInfo. Then should
00072  *   probably use special free routines.
00073  *
00074  * \modifications
00075  *    - 7/17/2005 WSD moved file IO stuff out into file io modules.
00076  */
00077 typedef struct {
00078   _FC_SlotHeader header; /**<  Header, which contains general purpose info. */
00079   //---File reference
00080   FC_FileIOType fileType;  /**< Type of file format */
00081   char *baseFile;          /**< Path to primary file of format */
00082   _FC_DsFileIOInfo fileInfo; /**< Holds info pertinent to file access. */
00083   //---Flag for whether dataset is writable
00084   int writable;   /**< 1 = can write this dataset to disk. 0 = can NOT write 
00085                dataset to disk (because it was loaded as read only) */
00086   //---Owned entities:
00087   //---sequences
00088   int numSeq;     /**< Number of sequences owned by this dataset. */
00089   int *seqIDs;    /**< Array of the slot numbers identifying the sequences
00090                       owned by this dataset. */
00091   //---meshes
00092   int numMesh;    /**< Number of meshes owned by this dataset. */
00093   int *meshIDs;   /**< Array of the slot numbers identifying the meshes
00094                       owned by this dataset. */
00095   //---global variables
00096   int numBasicVar; /**< Number of basic variables (i.e. non-sequence vars) */
00097   int* basicVarIDs; /** < Array of slot IDs for the basic variables */
00098   int numSeqVar;    /**< Number of sequence variables owned. */
00099   int *numStepPerSeqVar; /**< Number of steps in each seq var */
00100   int **seqVarIDs;   /**< Array of slot IDs identifying the vars that make 
00101                           up the sequence vars. This array has the dimensions
00102                           [numSeqVar][numStepPerSeq]. */
00103 } _FC_DsSlot;
00104 
00105 // basic slot 
00106 void _fc_initDsSlot(_FC_DsSlot* dsSlot);
00107 void _fc_clearDsSlot(_FC_DsSlot *dsSlot);
00108 
00109 // table access
00110 int _fc_getDsTableSize(void);
00111 _FC_DsSlot* _fc_getNewDsSlot(void);
00112 _FC_DsSlot* _fc_getDsSlot(FC_Dataset dataset);
00113 _FC_DsSlot* _fc_getDsSlotFromID(int dsID);
00114 FC_ReturnCode _fc_deleteDsSlot(FC_Dataset dataset);
00115 void _fc_printDsTable(char *label);
00116 void _fc_freeDsTable(void);
00117 
00118 #ifdef __cplusplus
00119 }
00120 #endif
00121 
00122 #endif // _FC_DATASET_P_H_
